rows.label: qst702410_msg0001
rows.name:
How goes it, then? Have you found any
promising candidates for us yet?

rows.label: qst702410_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm sure the capital is teeming
with courageous team players.

rows.label: qst702410_msg0003
rows.name:
So if you happen upon some of
them, I hope you'll remember
to extend an invitation.

rows.label: qst702410_msg0004
rows.name:
And also, since we need 6 bodies...
You'd better play it safe and approach
about ten or so potential recruits.

rows.label: qst702410_msg0005
rows.name:
Just appealing to their sensibilities
may not be enough, and not all may
agree to join our noble cause...
